relevant_findings.general: No acute distress. Alert, oriented x3.
relevant_findings.HEENT: No scleral icterus. Mucous membranes moist.
relevant_findings.cardiovascular: Regular rate and rhythm, prominent systolic murmur due to mechanical valve.
relevant_findings.pulmonary: Unlabored breathing, clear to auscultation bilaterally.
relevant_findings.abdominal: Soft, nondistended, tenderness to palpation in right upper quadrant, positive Murphy's sign. No rebound or guarding. No masses.
relevant_findings.extremities: Warm without cyanosis or clubbing. Healing medial and lateral fasciotomy sites with good granulation tissue.
